text:
Yo folks, we hiring - again. This time mid level devs, not remote, but in centre of Zagreb, Croatia. Yeah, that sunny thing next to Italy. Yeah people actually live here. Yep, we do have the best food and wine. I agree, it is mostly awesome.
So like - we’re Stroer Media Brands now, we need a mid-level Android and iOS devs to join my team and work on some uber new cool stuff, you’ll be using exciting new technologies such as AsyncTasks, ApacheHTTP, Javascript without the scripts… jk lol nope, only legacy thing you’ll have is a keystore. We do fun stuff, we watch funny youtube videos on apple tv and I chase people around the office with a kylo ren lightsaber I ordered from china. We have a bulgarian dude who will tell you everything is better over there. We have :beers: and :coffee: . I also got new earphones so you won’t have to listen to kanye all day long (but preferably you’ll want to).

text: <@U04U5KS3Z|kv87> pinned a message to this channel.
"We have a bulgarian dude who will tell you everything is better over there.” lol, i had the same in my previos job
it’s a bulgarian thing i guess :joy:
<@U0548MM6B> Will you provide me Rakia too?
On serious note, do you guys provide relocation and visa sponsor?

I’ll supply you with rakia until you can’t stand on your feet!
Tbh I’m really not sure what the visa state is with Croatia-Japan relations, but I’m pretty sure they’d be in on it since we’ve had (and currently have) foreigners working here.
Actually my passport is still Indonesian passport, so I think I'll need working visa to work there

attachments.title: Ströer Media Brands
attachments.text: Ströer Media Brands ist ein digitales Medienunternehmen, das Premium-Inhalte in Form von Videos und Artikeln für Influencer und Digital Natives publiziert.

text: yes, we got acquired by that company recently and are now taking over the mobile development for their platforms. First was <http://kino.de|kino.de> , now another portal of theirs is coming up.
Doesn’t seem like it’s too hard to get a working visa for croatia
I got to go catch some sleep now but DM me if you got questions or email me ( ianrumac at <http://gmail.com|gmail.com>) :heart:
